fields.name: Continue
fields.fieldText:
👮‍♂️

﻿Stop!

Please follow one of those process to merge duplicates.


Steps to follow for any type of duplicate:


⌾ Merge one P.K. with other accounts without P.K. (or merge only accounts without P.K.) for the same merchant

 

1. Click on this spreadsheet & Copy/Paste the right Lead URLs

2. Update the kept account (with P.K.) following the process:

  • Marketplace Merchant Pseudo #1 (or #2 or #3): paste the original ‘Business Name’ of the merged account(s) (without P.K.)

3. Update the merged account(s) (without P.K.) selecting these picklist options:

  • Business Name: same Business Name as the account with P.K.
  • Stage: ‘Not relevant’
  • Challenging Point: ‘Duplicate Account’


⌾ Merge at least two P.K.s for the same merchant

(Your prospect created several accounts on the Back Office thus generated several PK)

 

1. Select only the account with the last P.K.

2. Update the other account(s) with P.K.s selecting these picklist options:

  • Parent Merchant: the selected account with the last P.K.
  • Stage: Not relevant 
  • Challenging Point: Duplicate Account
  • In General Notes, please indicate the selected account with the last P.K. (with its URL)

The Salesforce Team does not take cases anymore. Please refer to your manager or follow the new JIRA process to submit your request.

fields.name: CaseType
fields.fieldText: Case Type

fields.name: Warning
fields.fieldText:
WARNING

👮‍♂️

﻿

Business Arbitration can only be submitted by TL and supply leaders

value.stringValue: Click here to see the descriptions for each case type

fields.name: Explanation
fields.fieldText:
How to choose my case Type?


Bug/Error - You are facing an issue in Salesforce (error message, a process that has been created 2 times, a field that shouldn't be empty...).


Field(s) Creation - You need the Salesforce team to create a new field to track info. Reminder - In order for fields to be created, it needs to be useful, up-to-date, and always contain accurate data.


Import - You need the Salesforce team to create and/or update several records at once.


Merge Duplicates - You need the Salesforce team to merge 2 accounts together.


Project Proposition - You discussed with all teams impacted and need a feature creation, upgrade or removal.


Question - You have a question that isn't related to a bug.


Report/Dashboard - You need the Salesforce Team to create report(s) and/or dashboard(s) for you and your team.


User Creation - A newcomer is joining our team, and you need a SF access for her/him.


SSC Access - You need to give a contact access to the SSC.


Other - Any other topic not related to the above list.

fields.name: Guideline_user_creation
fields.fieldText:
👮‍♂️

﻿Stop!

For user creation, please use this Gsheet.


Salesforce Team will review this document on Fridays and users will be created on Mondays.

Columns in blue are mandatory info, without them, we cannot create a user.
